DimSource select(mapColumn(
		Hash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectHash
FilterLastModifiedLead select(mapColumn(
		SourceName = LeadSource
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectLeadSource
ODSLead filter(toDate(LastModifiedDate) >= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), ($DaysToLoad * -1)) && toDate(LastModifiedDate) <= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), -1) && !isNull(LeadSource)) ~> FilterLastModifiedLead
SelectLeadSource aggregate(groupBy(SourceName),
	each(match(name!='SourceName'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctLeadSource
UnionAccount derive(SourceSystem = 'Salesforce',
		SourceName = initCap(trim(SourceName)),
		IsActive = toBoolean('1'),
		DWH_LastUpdateDate = currentTimestamp(),
		DWH_CreatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddCustomColumnsLead
AddCustomColumnsLead derive(Hash = sha2(256, concat(lower(SourceName), SourceSystem))) ~> AddHash
DistinctHash, SelectHash exists(DistinctHash@Hash == SelectHash@Hash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DoesNotExist
ODSAccount filter(toDate(LastModifiedDate) >= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), ($DaysToLoad * -1)) && toDate(LastModifiedDate) <= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), -1) && !isNull(AccountSource)) ~> FilterLastModifiedAccount
FilterLastModifiedAccount select(mapColumn(
		SourceName = AccountSource
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAccountSource
SelectAccountSource aggregate(groupBy(SourceName),
	each(match(name!='SourceName'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctAccountSource
DistinctLeadSource, DistinctAccountSource union(byName: true)~> UnionAccount
AddHash aggregate(groupBy(Hash),
	each(match(name!='Hash'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctHash
DoesNotExist sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SourceKey as integer,
		SourceName as string,
		Hash as string,
		DWH_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate as timestamp,
		IsActive as boolean,
		SourceSystem as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SourceName,
		Hash,
		DWH_CreatedDate,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate,
		IsActive,
		SourceSystem
	)) ~> InsertDimSource

source(output(
		FormatKey as integer,
		FormatName as string,
		FormatValue as string,
		DWH_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		DWH_LastUpdate as timestamp,
		IsActive as boolean,
		Source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SourceDimFormat
ODSTelevision filter(toDate(DWH_LoadDate) >= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), ($DaysToLoad * -1)) && toDate(DWH_LoadDate) <= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), -1) && !isNull(format)) ~> FilterLastUpload
ODSCampaign filter(toDate(LastModifiedDate) >= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), ($DaysToLoad * -1)) && toDate(LastModifiedDate) <= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), -1) && !isNull(Format__c)) ~> FilterLastModified
FilterLastModified select(mapColumn(
		Format__c
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectFormat
FilterLastUpload select(mapColumn(
		format
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectFormatColumn
SelectFormatColumn aggregate(groupBy(format),
	each(match(name!='format'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctFormatTelevision
SelectFormat aggregate(groupBy(Format__c),
	each(match(name!='Format__c'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctFormatCampaign
CustomColumns, DerivedColumnCampaign union(byName: true)~> Union
DistinctFormatTelevision derive(IsActive = toBoolean('1'),
		Source = 'Marketing',
		FormatName = initCap(trim(format))) ~> CustomColumns
DistinctFormatCampaign derive(IsActive = toBoolean('1'),
		Source = 'Salesforce',
		FormatName = initCap(trim(Format__c))) ~> DerivedColumnCampaign
Union, SelectFormatColumns exists(Union@FormatName == SelectFormatColumns@FormatName
	&& Union@Source == SelectFormatColumns@Source,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Union, SelectFormatColumns exists(Union@FormatName == SelectFormatColumns@FormatName
	&& Union@Source == SelectFormatColumns@Source,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DoesNotExist
SourceDimFormat select(mapColumn(
		FormatKey,
		FormatName,
		FormatValue,
		DWH_CreatedDate,
		DWH_LastUpdate,
		IsActive,
		Source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFormatColumns
DoesNotExist derive(DWH_CreatedDate = currentTimestamp(),
		DWH_LastUpdate = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddColumnsDates
Exists alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AllowUpdate
AllowUpdate derive(DWH_LastUpdate = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddUpdateColumn
AddUpdateColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		FormatKey as integer,
		FormatName as string,
		FormatValue as string,
		DWH_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		DWH_LastUpdate as timestamp,
		IsActive as boolean,
		Source as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['FormatName'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		FormatName,
		DWH_LastUpdate,
		IsActive,
		Source
	)) ~> UpdateFormat
AddColumnsDates sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		FormatKey as integer,
		FormatName as string,
		FormatValue as string,
		DWH_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		DWH_LastUpdate as timestamp,
		IsActive as boolean,
		Source as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		FormatName,
		DWH_CreatedDate,
		DWH_LastUpdate,
		IsActive,
		Source
	)) ~> InsertFormat

ODSLead filter(toDate(LastModifiedDate) >= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), ($DaysToLoad * -1)) && toDate(LastModifiedDate) <= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), -1) && !isNull(Status)) ~> FilterLeadLastModified
FilterLeadLastModified aggregate(groupBy(Status),
	each(match(name!='Status'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctStatus
DistinctStatus select(mapColumn(
		StatusName = Status
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStatus
SelectStatus derive(StatusGroup = 'Lead',
		IsActive = 1,
		SourceSystem = 'Salesforce') ~> AddStaticColumnsLead
ODSCampaign filter(toDate(LastModifiedDate) >= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), ($DaysToLoad * -1)) && toDate(LastModifiedDate) <= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), -1) && !isNull(Status)) ~> FilterCapaignLastModified
FilterCapaignLastModified aggregate(groupBy(Status),
	each(match(name!='Status'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctCampaignStatus
DistinctCampaignStatus select(mapColumn(
		StatusName = Status
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectStatusCampaign
SelectStatusCampaign derive(StatusGroup = 'Campaign',
		IsActive = 1,
		SourceSystem = 'Salesforce') ~> AddStaticColumns
AddStaticColumns, AddStaticColumnsLead union(byName: true)~> UnionLead
AddDateColumnsAndHash alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AllowUpsert
ODSAccount filter(toDate(LastModifiedDate) >= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), ($DaysToLoad * -1)) && toDate(LastModifiedDate) <= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), -1) && !isNull(Customer_Status__c)) ~> FilterLastModifiedStatus
FilterLastModifiedStatus select(mapColumn(
		StatusName = Customer_Status__c
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAccountStatus
SelectAccountStatus aggregate(groupBy(StatusName),
	each(match(name!='StatusName'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctAccountSource
DistinctAccountSource derive(StatusGroup = 'Account',
		IsActive = 1,
		SourceSystem = 'Salesforce') ~> AddStaticColumnsAccount
UnionLead, AddStaticColumnsAccount union(byName: true)~> UnionAccount
UnionServiceAppointment derive(DWH_LastUpdateDate = currentTimestamp(),
		DWH_LoadDate = currentTimestamp(),
		Hash = sha2(256, concat(StatusName, StatusGroup,SourceSystem))) ~> AddDateColumnsAndHash
ODSServiceAppointment filter(toDate(LastModifiedDate) >= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), ($DaysToLoad * -1)) && toDate(LastModifiedDate) <= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), -1) && !isNull(Status)) ~> FilterAppointmentLastModified
FilterAppointmentLastModified select(mapColumn(
		StatusName = Status
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAppointmentStatus
SelectAppointmentStatus aggregate(groupBy(StatusName),
	each(match(name!='StatusName'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctAppointmentStatus
DistinctAppointmentStatus derive(StatusGroup = 'ServiceAppointment',
		IsActive = 1,
		SourceSystem = 'Salesforce') ~> AddStaticColumnsAppointment
UnionAccount, AddStaticColumnsAppointment union(byName: true)~> UnionServiceAppointment
AllowUpsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		StatusKey as integer,
		Hash as string,
		StatusName as string,
		StatusGroup as string,
		DWH_LoadDate as timestamp,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate as timestamp,
		IsActive as integer,
		SourceSystem as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Hash'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Hash,
		StatusName,
		StatusGroup,
		DWH_LoadDate,
		DWH_LastUpdateDate,
		IsActive,
		SourceSystem
	)) ~> UpdateStatus

ODSTelevision filter(iif($DaysToLoad == -1, like(FilePath, concat('%', $FilePath, '%')), toDate(DWH_LoadDate) >= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), ($DaysToLoad * -1)) && toDate(DWH_LoadDate) <= addDays(toDate(currentTimestamp()), -1))) ~> FilterLastUpload
JoinTimeOfDay, DimAgency join(lower(trim(split(ODSTelevision@agency, ' ')[1])) == lower(trim(AgencyName)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAgency
JoinAgency, DimFormat join(format == FormatValue,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinFormat
JoinFormat, DimTactic join(lower(tactic) == lower(TacticName),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTactic
JoinTactic, FilterSourceSystem join(initCap(trim(ODSTelevision@source)) == SourceName,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSource
JoinSource, DimPurpose join(initCap(trim(purpose)) == PurposeName,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinPurpose
JoinPurpose, DimCompany join(initCap(trim(company)) == CompanyName,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCompany
JoinCompany, FilterSocialMedia join(initCap(trim(ODSTelevision@location)) == LocationName,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLocation
JoinMethod, DimLanguage join(initCap(trim(language)) == initCap(trim(LanguageShortCode)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLanguage
JoinBudget derive(FactDateKey = DateKey,
		FactDate = CalendarDateTimeUTC,
		MarketingActivityDate = toDate(CalendarDateTimeUTC),
		MarketingActivityTime = split(toString(CalendarDateTimeUTC), ' ')[2],
		LocalAirTime = localairtime,
		TransactionId = toInteger(transactionid),
		AgencyName = initCap(AgencyName),
		File = FilePath,
		BudgetAmount = toDecimal(BudgetAmount),
		GrossSpend = case(lower(AgencyName) == 'intermedia', toDecimal(netspend)*(1.1), 
      like(lower(AgencyName), '%kingstar%'),  (toDecimal(netspend)/0.95), toDecimal(netspend)),
		NetSpend = toDecimal(netspend),
		SpotDate = toDate(null()),
		Spots = toInteger(spots),
		Telephone = toString(null()),
		SourceCode = sourcecode,
		PromoCode = promocode,
		Url = url,
		{Impressions18-65} = toInteger({impressions18-65}),
		Affiliate = affiliate,
		Station = initCap(station),
		Show = initCap(show),
		ContentType = initCap(contenttype),
		Content = initCap(content),
		Isci = isci,
		MasterNumber = masternumber,
		DMAkey = iifNull(toInteger(null()), -1),
		AgencyKey = iifNull(AgencyKey,-1, AgencyKey),
		AudienceKey = iifNull(AudienceKey, -1, AudienceKey),
		ChannelKey = iifNull(ChannelKey, -1, ChannelKey),
		FormatKey = iifNull(FormatKey, -1, FormatKey),
		TacticKey = iifNull(TacticKey, -1, TacticKey),
		SourceKey = iifNull(SourceKey, -1, SourceKey),
		MediumKey = iifNull(MediumKey, -1, MediumKey),
		PurposeKey = iifNull(PurposeKey, -1,PurposeKey),
		MethodKey = iifNull(MethodKey, -1, MethodKey),
		BudgetTypeKey = iifNull(BudgetKey, -1, BudgetKey),
		CampaignKey = iifNull(toInteger(null()), -1),
		LocationKey = iifNull(LocationKey, -1, LocationKey),
		LanguageKey = iifNull(LanguageKey, -1, LanguageKey),
		NumberOfLeads = toInteger(null()),
		NumberOfLeadsTarget = TaregetLeads,
		NumertOfOpportunities = toInteger(null()),
		NumberOfOpportunitiesTarget = toInteger(null()),
		NumberOfSales = toInteger(null()),
		NumberOfSalesTarget = toInteger(null()),
		DWH_LoadDate = ODSTelevision@DWH_LoadDate,
		Agency = initCap(trim(ODSTelevision@agency)),
		DMA = -1,
		Audience = initCap(trim(audiene)),
		Channel = initCap(trim(ODSTelevision@channel)),
		Format = initCap(trim(format)),
		Tactict = initCap(trim(tactic)),
		Source = initCap(trim(sourcecode)),
		Medium = initCap(trim(ODSTelevision@medium)),
		Purpose = initCap(trim(purpose)),
		Method = initCap(trim(method)),
		BudgetName = initCap(trim(ODSTelevision@budgetname)),
		BudgetType = initCap(trim(ODSTelevision@budgettype)),
		Campaign = initCap(trim(campaign)),
		Location = initCap(trim(ODSTelevision@location)),
		Language = initCap(trim(language)),
		Company = initCap(company),
		LogType = logtype,
		Hash = sha2(256, concat(transactionid, ODSTelevision@agency, calendardateest, calendartimeest)),
		CompanyKey = coalesce(CompanyKey, -1)) ~> CalculatedColumns
CalculeUTCTime, SelectDateKey join(toDate(CalendarDateTimeUTC) == FullDate,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDate
DimDate select(mapColumn(
		DateKey,
		FullDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectDateKey
JoinLanguage derive(CalendarDateTimeUTC = toTimestamp(concat(calendardateest,' ', Time24HM, ':00'))) ~> CalculeUTCTime
JoinDate, DimAudience join(initCap(trim(audiene)) == AudienceName,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAudience
JoinAudience, DimMedium join(initCap(trim(ODSTelevision@medium)) == MediumName,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMedium
DiscountsAndFees select(mapColumn(
		each(match(stream=='DiscountsAndFees'||stream=='CalculatedColumns'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

DimSource filter(SourceSystem == 'Marketing') ~> FilterSourceSystem
JoinChannel, DimMethod join(initCap(trim(method)) == MethodName,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMethod
JoinLocation, DimChannel join(sha2(256, concat(initCap(trim(ODSTelevision@channel)),'TV')) == DimChannel@Hash,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinChannel
JoinMedium, FilterBudgetSocialMedia join(sha2(256, concat(initCap(trim(ODSTelevision@budgetname)), initCap(trim(ODSTelevision@budgettype)))) == DimBudget@Hash,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinBudget
FilterLastUpload derive(CalendarTimeESTMinute = iif(instr(lower(calendartimeest), 'pm') != 0 || instr(lower(calendartimeest), 'am') != 0, split(split(trim(calendartimeest), ':')[2], ' ')[1], 'na'),
		CalendarTimeESTHour = iif(instr(lower(calendartimeest), 'pm') != 0 || instr(lower(calendartimeest), 'am') != 0, split(trim(calendartimeest), ':')[1], 'na'),
		CalendarTimeESTName = split(calendartimeest, ' ')[2],
		calendardateest = case(instr(calendardateest, '/') != 0 && lower(trim(agency)) != 'cannella', toString(toDate(calendardateest, 'MM/dd/yyyy')),
lower(trim(agency)) == 'cannella', toString(toDate(calendardateest, 'yyyy/MM/dd')),
 calendardateest),
		calendartimeest = iif(length(trim(calendartimeest)) ==8, trim(calendartimeest), concat('0',trim(calendartimeest))),
		grossspend = replace(replace(grossspend, '$', ''), ',', ''),
		netspend = replace(replace(netspend, '$', ''), ',', '')) ~> TransformDates
JoinTargets, DistincHour join(lower(trim(calendartimeest)) == lower(trim(MinuteName)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTimeOfDay
DimTimeOfDay aggregate(groupBy(MinuteName,
		Time24HM),
	each(match(name!='MinuteName'&&name!='Time24HM'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistincHour
TransformDates, ODSTargets join(lower(trim(ODSTelevision@budgettype)) == lower(trim(ODSTargets@BudgetType))
	&& month(toDate(calendardateest)) == month(toDate(Date))
	&& year(toDate(calendardateest)) == year(toDate(Date))
	&& lower(trim(ODSTelevision@agency)) == lower(trim(ODSTargets@Agency))
	&& lower(trim(ODSTelevision@channel)) == lower(trim(ODSTargets@Channel))
	&& lower(trim(ODSTelevision@medium)) == lower(trim(ODSTargets@Medium))
	&& lower(trim(budgetname)) == lower(trim(Budget))
	&& lower(trim(ODSTelevision@location)) == lower(trim(ODSTargets@Location)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTargets
DimLocation filter(Source  == 'SocialMedia') ~> FilterSocialMedia
DimBudget filter(SourceSystem == 'Social Media') ~> FilterBudgetSocialMedia
NotExists alterRow(deleteIf(case(like(lower($FilePath),'%airings%'),lower(AgencyName)==lower('Cannella'),like(lower($FilePath),'%hrcb%'),(lower(AgencyName)==lower('Intermedia')&&lower(Medium)!='ott'),like(lower($FilePath),'%havas%'),lower(AgencyName)==lower('Havas')))) ~> AllowDelete
CalculatedColumns derive(Discount = (toDecimal(CalculatedColumns@GrossSpend)/iifNull(toDecimal(CADPrice), 1))*0.15*-1,
		Fees = (toDecimal(CalculatedColumns@GrossSpend)/iifNull(toDecimal(CADPrice), 1))*0.10) ~> DiscountsAndFees
FactMarketing filter((month(FactDate) == month(currentTimestamp()) ||  month(FactDate) == (month(currentTimestamp())-1) ) && year(FactDate) == year(currentTimestamp())) ~> FilterByMonth
SelectFinalColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AllowUpsert
SelectHashFactMark, SelectFinalColumns exists(SelectHashFactMark@Hash == SelectFinalColumns@Hash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NotExists
FilterByMonth select(mapColumn(

		AgencyName,
		Medium
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectHashFactMark
ODSTargets derive(Date = month(toDate(Date))) ~> DateColumn

ODSBPCallDetail select(mapColumn(
		CallId = id,
		caller_phone_type,
		callee_phone_type,
		caller_login_id,
		callee_login_id,
		media_type,
		agent_disposition_code,
		CallPkId = pkid,
		CallMediaType = media_type,
		FactDate = start_time,
		CallDate = start_time,
		CallIvrTime = ivr_time,
		CallQueueTime = queue_time,
		CallPendingTime = pending_time,
		CallTalkTime = talk_time,
		CallHoldTime = hold_time,
		CallHeld = held,
		CallMaxHold = max_hold,
		CallAcwTime = acw_time,
		CallDuration = duration,
		ServiceName = service_name,
		ScenarioName = scenario_name,
		AgentDispositionName = agent_disposition_name,
		custom1,
		custom2,
		custom3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCallDetail
DimDate select(mapColumn(
		DateKey,
		FullDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimDate
DimeTimeOfDay select(mapColumn(
		TimeOfDayKey,
		Hour24,
		Minute,
		Second
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimTimeOfDay
JoinService, SelectDimDate join(toDate(FactDate) == FullDate,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinWithDimDate
JoinWithDimDate, SelectDimTimeOfDay join(second(FactDate) == Second
	&& minute(FactDate) == Minute
	&& hour(FactDate) == Hour24,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimTimeOfDay
DimLead select(mapColumn(
		LeadKey,
		LeadId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimLead
JoinDimTimeOfDay, SelectDimLead join(custom1 == LeadId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimLead
DimSource select(mapColumn(
		SourceKey,
		SourceName,
		Source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSource
JoinDimLead, DimAgentDisposition join(lower(trim(SelectCallDetail@AgentDispositionName)) == lower(trim(DimAgentDisposition@AgentDispositionName)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimAgentDisposition
SelectTempColumns derive(FactDateKey = DateKey,
		FactTimeKey = TimeOfDayKey,
		FactDate = FactDate,
		CallId = CallId,
		CallMediaType = initCap(media_type),
		MediaKey = iifNull(MediaKey, -1),
		CallPkId = toString(CallPkId),
		CallDate = FactDate,
		CallIvrTime = CallIvrTime,
		CallQueueTime = CallQueueTime,
		CallPendingTime = CallPendingTime,
		CallTalkTime = CallTalkTime,
		CallHoldTime = CallHoldTime,
		CallHeld = CallHeld,
		CallMaxHold = CallMaxHold,
		CallAcwTime = CallAcwTime,
		CallDuration = CallDuration,
		ServiceName = ServiceName,
		ServiceKey = iifNull(ServiceKey, -1),
		AgentDispositionKey = iifNull(AgentDispositionKey, -1),
		AgentDispositionName = AgentDispositionName,
		ScenarioName = initCap(ScenarioName),
		ScenarioKey = iifNull(ScenarioKey, -1),
		LeadKey = LeadKey,
		LeadId = LeadId,
		TaskId = custom2,
		IncommingSourceCode = custom3,
		SourceKey = -1,
		CallType = CallType,
		CallTypeKey = iifNull(CallTypeKey, -1),
		AgentLogin = AgentLogin,
		AgentKey = iifNull(UserKey, -1),
		IsViableCall = IsViableCall,
		IsProductiveCall = case(in(['Appointment-ExistingLead',
                                                         'Appointment-NewLead',
                                                         'Brochure-NewLead',
                                                         'GeneralInquiry-NoleadCreated',
                                                         'GeneralInquiry-NewLead',
                                                         'Recovery',
                                                         'Recycle'
], replace(AgentDispositionName,' ','')), 1,   0)) ~> MapColumns
JoinScenario, SelectSource join(custom3 == SelectSource@Source,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSource
CalculateColumnsColumn, CallTypeColumns join(lower(CallType) == lower(CallTypeName),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCallType
DimCallType select(mapColumn(
		CallTypeKey,
		CallTypeName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CallTypeColumns
JoinSource derive(CallType = case(initCap(trim(caller_phone_type)) == 'Internal' && initCap(trim(callee_phone_type)) == 'External', 'Outbound', 
    initCap(trim(caller_phone_type)) == 'External' && initCap(trim(callee_phone_type)) == 'Internal' && instr(iifNull(lower(trim(SelectCallDetail@ServiceName)), ''),'sms')  == 0,'Inbound',
    initCap(trim(caller_phone_type)) == 'External' && initCap(trim(callee_phone_type)) == 'Internal' && instr(iifNull(lower(trim(SelectCallDetail@ServiceName)), ''), 'sms') > 0,'SMS',
    (initCap(trim(caller_phone_type)) == 'External' || isNull(caller_phone_type)) && (initCap(trim(callee_phone_type)) == 'External' || isNull(caller_phone_type)) && instr(iifNull(lower(trim(SelectCallDetail@ServiceName)), ''), 'dial now')> 0,'Outbound',
    (initCap(trim(caller_phone_type)) == 'External' || isNull(caller_phone_type)) && (initCap(trim(callee_phone_type)) == 'External' || isNull(caller_phone_type)) && instr(iifNull(lower(trim(SelectCallDetail@ServiceName)), ''), 'inbound')> 0, 'Inbound',
    initCap(trim(caller_phone_type)) == 'Internal' && initCap(trim(callee_phone_type)) == 'Internal', 'Transfer', 'Unknown' ),
		AgentLogin = case(initCap(trim(caller_phone_type)) == 'External', initCap(trim(callee_login_id)), initCap(trim(caller_phone_type)) == 'Internal', caller_login_id, toString(null())),
		IsViableCall = case(  in(['Appointment-ExistingLead', 
														 'Appointment-NewLead',
														 'Brochure-NewLead', 
														 'GeneralInquiry-NoleadCreated',
														 'GeneralInquiry-NewLead', 
														 'Recovery', 
														 'Recycle'
 ], replace(SelectCallDetail@AgentDispositionName,' ','') ),
					   1
				   ,
					   0)) ~> CalculateColumnsColumn
JoinCallType, DimSystemUser join(lower(toString(agent_disposition_code)) == lower(UserId),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinUserSystem
JoinDimAgentDisposition, DimMedia join(lower(trim(media_type)) == lower(trim(MediaName)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMedia
DimMedia filter(Source == 'Bright Pattern') ~> FilterMediaSource
MapColumns select(mapColumn(
		each(match(stream=='MapColumns'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectFinalColumns
JoinUserSystem select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTempColumns
JoinMedia, DimScenario join(lower(trim(SelectCallDetail@ScenarioName)) == lower(DimScenario@ScenarioName),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinScenario
SelectCallDetail, DimService join(lower(trim(SelectCallDetail@ServiceName)) == lower(trim(DimService@ServiceName)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinService
DimService select(mapColumn(
		ServiceKey,
		DimServiceName = ServiceName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectService
SelectFinalColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		FactDateKey as integer,
		FactTimeKey as integer,
		FactDate as timestamp,
		CallId as binary,
		CallMediaType as string,
		MediaKey as integer,
		CallPkId as string,
		CallDate as timestamp,
		CallIvrTime as integer,
		CallQueueTime as integer,
		CallPendingTime as integer,
		CallTalkTime as integer,
		CallHoldTime as integer,
		CallHeld as integer,
		CallMaxHold as integer,
		CallAcwTime as integer,
		CallDuration as integer,
		ServiceName as string,
		ServiceKey as integer,
		ScenarioName as string,
		ScenarioKey as integer,
		LeadKey as integer,
		LeadId as string,
		TaskId as string,
		IncommingSourceCode as string,
		SourceKey as integer,
		CallType as string,
		CallTypeKey as integer,
		AgentDisposition as string,
		AgentDispositionKey as integer,
		AgentLogin as string,
		AgentKey as integer,
		IsViableCall as integer,
		IsProductiveCall as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CallId'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		FactDateKey,
		FactTimeKey,
		FactDate,
		CallId,
		CallMediaType,
		MediaKey,
		CallPkId,
		CallDate,
		CallIvrTime,
		CallQueueTime,
		CallPendingTime,
		CallTalkTime,
		CallHoldTime,
		CallHeld,
		CallMaxHold,
		CallAcwTime,
		CallDuration,
		ServiceName,
		ServiceKey,
		ScenarioName,
		ScenarioKey,
		LeadKey,
		LeadId,
		TaskId,
		IncommingSourceCode,
		SourceKey,
		CallType,
		CallTypeKey,
		AgentDisposition = AgentDispositionName,
		AgentDispositionKey,
		AgentLogin,
		AgentKey,
		IsViableCall,
		IsProductiveCall
	)) ~> FactCallDetail
